sentence.Network_en: He was actually too depleted to think consecutively about anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已经打不起一点精神,根本谈不上好好思考一下.

sentence.Network_en: In any game, the right to serve shall pass consecutively.
sentence.Network_cn: 在一局中, 不错的发球挨次应该是.

sentence.Network_en: He was consecutively ill, then well, then ill again.
sentence.Network_cn: 他老是生病, 康复不久就会再次病倒.

list.abs: 交替传译（consecutive interpreting）- 口译员坐在会议室里，一面听源语讲话，一面记笔记。当讲者发言结束或停下来等候传译的时 …
是逐句口译（consecutive interpretation）。把听到的句子逐一译成汉语，这对于听力，正确的理解及反应能力也是很好的锻炼。
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... consecutive integers 连续整数 consecutive numbers 连续数；相邻数 consequence 结论；推论.
PERCENTILE函数 - Sean的日志 - 网易博客 ... Prime number 质数 Consecutive number 连续整数 Cross multiply 交叉相乘.

entry.def: Consecutive periods of time or events happen one after the other without interruption.

example.ex: The Cup was won for the third consecutive year by the Toronto Maple Leafs...
example.tran: 多伦多枫叶队连续第三年捧杯。

example.ex: Photographs taken at the same time on two consecutive sunny days can be quite different from one another.
example.tran: 在连续两个艳阳天的同一时间拍摄的照片也可能大不相同。

sentences.sentence: "he was consecutively ill, then well, then ill again"
